wikipedia_page.main: Roy Fleetwood (born 1946 in London) is a British architect and designer. He is director of the Office for Design Strategy in Cambridge, England.

response: * October 22: YKK Manufacturing and Engineering Centre in Namerikawa, Toyama, Japan, designed by Roy Fleetwood and Kenji Sugimura, is opened.
* Roy Fleetwood (born 1946), British architect and designer

Architects Roy Fleetwood and Kenji Sugimura produced a design of the building that brings the theme of “people and technology“ to the fore, developing a harmony between the two. The dominant materials of the building are steel and glass. The entrance
Then he founded, with his partner Roy Fleetwood, the architectural firm Sugimura Fleetwood Architects and Engineers in Tokyo in 1988.
